name: Cloudthread
headline: Eliminate Cloud Waste. Attribute and Track Savings. Engage Engineers.
description: Cloudthread is an analytics platform that helps engineering teams build cost efficiently in the cloud. We were behind Lyft's internal cloud cost management system and now we use that deep expertise to help organizations save hours of engineering time, reduce cloud bills, and prevent costly re-architectures.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:finops; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:cloud-computing; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ilia Semenov, Founder

# Cloudthread Is Joining Forces with Finout
Apr 2nd, 2024
![Cloudthread Is Joining Forces with Finout](https://www.finout.io/hs-fs/hubfs/3Cloudthread_Mar24_.png?width=522&height=300&name=3Cloudthread_Mar24_.png)
[ ](https://cloudthread.io/<javascript:;>) [ ](https://cloudthread.io/<javascript:;>) [ ](https://cloudthread.io/<javascript:;>)
URL Copied
Today marks a significant milestone for Finout, and I am thrilled to share this news with our valued community, customers, and partners. Cloudthread is joining forces with Finout, a move that promises to accelerate our growth and most importantly, deliver even greater value to you, our customers.
From the outset, Finout has been on a mission to revolutionize the way companies monitor, manage, and optimize their cloud spend across all providers and services. We've always believed in the power of innovation, community building, and the importance of providing our customers with the best tools to succeed in an increasingly cloud-centric world. Having Cloudthread join Finout is a natural extension of this mission.
**Joining Forces to Enhance Cloud Cost Optimization** Cloudthread has been on the frontier of cloud cost usage optimization, helping companies achieve distributed cloud cost ownership with unparalleled efficiency. By joining forces, we're bringing together the best of both worlds: Finout's comprehensive cloud cost management platform and Cloudthread's know-how in usage optimization.
**Looking Ahead** Finout will continue to deliver our enterprise-grade FinOps platform and lead the next-gen FinOps offerings - and combined, we are stronger than ever.
It's time to say special thanks to the Cloudthread team for everything they built so far, and we could not be more excited to learn from their experience and enhance the value to our customers.
Stay tuned for more updates - a lot more is coming.As always, feel free to reach out with any questions or feedback. Here's to a bright future together!
Roi Ravhon CEO, Finout

# Cloudthread Is Joining Forces with Finout
Apr 2nd, 2024
![Cloudthread Is Joining Forces with Finout‚ü®67‚ü©]
 ‚ü®68‚ü©  ‚ü®68‚ü©  ‚ü®68‚ü©
URL Copied
Today marks a significant milestone for Finout, and I am thrilled to share this news with our valued community, customers, and partners. Cloudthread is joining forces with Finout, a move that promises to accelerate our growth and most importantly, deliver even greater value to you, our customers.
From the outset, Finout has been on a mission to revolutionize the way companies monitor, manage, and optimize their cloud spend across all providers and services. We've always believed in the power of innovation, community building, and the importance of providing our customers with the best tools to succeed in an increasingly cloud-centric world. Having Cloudthread join Finout is a natural extension of this mission.
**Joining Forces to Enhance Cloud Cost Optimization** Cloudthread has been on the frontier of cloud cost usage optimization, helping companies achieve distributed cloud cost ownership with unparalleled efficiency. By joining forces, we're bringing together the best of both worlds: Finout's comprehensive cloud cost management platform and Cloudthread's know-how in usage optimization.
**Looking Ahead** Finout will continue to deliver our enterprise-grade FinOps platform and lead the next-gen FinOps offerings - and combined, we are stronger than ever.
It's time to say special thanks to the Cloudthread team for everything they built so far, and we could not be more excited to learn from their experience and enhance the value to our customers.
Stay tuned for more updates - a lot more is coming.As always, feel free to reach out with any questions or feedback. Here's to a bright future together!
Roi Ravhon CEO, Finout

**Mission**: Cloudthread is on a straightforward mission: to eliminate cloud waste, attribute and track savings, and engage engineers. 

**Background**: Launched in 2020 and part of Y Combinator‚Äôs S21 batch, Cloudthread initially served as an analytics platform crafted to help engineering teams optimize their cloud costs. With a robust background that includes building Lyft's internal cloud cost management system, they leverage their expertise to aid organizations in saving time, cutting bills, and avoiding costly re-architectures.

**Location and Team**: Based in San Francisco, Cloudthread operates with a compact team of eight. The company is supported by Harj Taggar, a Group Partner at Y Combinator.

**Tags and Domain**: They're recognized in the following categories: developer tools, FinOps, B2B, workflow automation, and cloud computing.

**Services Offered**: Currently, Cloudthread is focused on various essential services that range from anomaly detection in cloud spending to comprehensive dashboards that provide insights into financial operations (FinOps). Key features include:
- **CostGuard**: A tool for detecting and mitigating waste from day one.
- **Virtual Tags**: Innovative solutions for accurate cost allocation.
- **AI Cost Management**: Efficient handling of cloud spending across various AI applications.

**Recent Developments**: Cloudthread has recently made headlines by joining forces with Finout, which enhances their capability to provide extensive cloud cost management solutions.

**Website**: For more information, visit [Cloudthread‚Äôs website](https://cloudthread.io).

This blend of technical prowess and strategic financial management positions Cloudthread as an indispensable asset for companies grappling with the complexities of cloud costs. In an era where every dollar counts, their approach to fostering strong connections within engineering teams and providing them with the right tools to optimize their cloud usage is nothing short of revolutionary.
